definitions.definition: give one's attention to a sound.
synonyms: prick up one's ears; informalbe all ears
lend an ear; literaryhark; archaichearken "are you listening?"

definitions.definition: take notice of and act on what someone says; respond to advice or a request.
examples: I told her over and over again, but she wouldn't listen
synonyms: tune in to "policy-makers should listen to popular opinion"

definitions.definition: make an effort to hear something; be alert and ready to hear something.
examples: they listened for sounds from the baby's room

definitions.definition: used to urge someone to pay attention to what one is going to say.
synonyms: prick up one's ears; informalbe all ears
lend an ear; literaryhark; archaichearken "are you listening?"
